name: Fun Bubble:Tap Breaker
description:
Fun Bubble:Tap Breaker is a bubble popper / bubble breaker game where tapping on groups of 2 or more adjacent bubbles of the same color causes them to pop. The bigger the group you pop, the more you score! Tap to pop bubble, the more bubble pop, the more score you will get! It is so simple and addictive that you will not stop playing.
How to Play:
- Tap two or more adjacent bubble of the same color.
- The more bubble crush at once time, the higher score you get.
- Game ends when there no bubble could be crush.
